message: Hello! My name is Kal. I am not a cousellor, I'm your Kids Help Phone Robot Pal. What's on your mind?
options.1.link: What topic do you want to learn about today?
options.2.link: Can I help you choose a game?

options.0.text: I want to talk to a counsellor.
options.1.text: I want to write a letter to a trusted adult.
options.2.text: I want to find a youth program in my area.
